member.name: M:Microsoft.Orleans.ServiceFabric.FabricMembershipOracle.GetApproximateSiloStatus(Orleans.Runtime.SiloAddress)
member.summary: Get the status of a given silo. This method returns an approximate view on the status of a given silo. In particular, this oracle may think the given silo is alive, while it may already have failed. If this oracle thinks the given silo is dead, it has been authoritatively told so by ISiloDirectory.
member.param: A silo whose status we are interested in.
member.returns: The status of a given silo.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Orleans.ServiceFabric.FabricMembershipOracle.GetApproximateSiloStatuses(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the statuses of all silo. This method returns an approximate view on the statuses of all silo.
member.param: Include only silo who are currently considered to be active. If false, include all.
member.returns: A list of silo statuses.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Orleans.ServiceFabric.FabricMembershipOracle.IsDeadSilo(Orleans.Runtime.SiloAddress)
member.summary: Determine if the current silo is dead.
member.returns: The silo so ask about.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Orleans.ServiceFabric.FabricMembershipOracle.IsFunctionalDirectory(Orleans.Runtime.SiloAddress)
member.summary: Determine if the current silo is valid for creating new activations on or for directory lookups.
member.returns: The silo so ask about.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Orleans.ServiceFabric.FabricMembershipOracle.Start
member.summary: Start this oracle. Will register this silo in the SiloDirectory with SiloStatus.Starting status.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Orleans.ServiceFabric.FabricMembershipOracle.BecomeActive
member.summary: Turns this oracle into an Active state. Will update this silo in the SiloDirectory with SiloStatus.Active status.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Orleans.ServiceFabric.FabricMembershipOracle.ShutDown
member.summary: ShutDown this oracle. Will update this silo in the SiloDirectory with SiloStatus.ShuttingDown status.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Orleans.ServiceFabric.FabricMembershipOracle.Stop
member.summary: Stop this oracle. Will update this silo in the SiloDirectory with SiloStatus.Stopping status.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Orleans.ServiceFabric.FabricMembershipOracle.KillMyself
member.summary: Completely kill this oracle. Will update this silo in the SiloDirectory with SiloStatus.Dead status.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Orleans.ServiceFabric.FabricMembershipOracle.TryGetSiloName(Orleans.Runtime.SiloAddress,System.String@)
member.summary: Get the name of a silo. Silo name is assumed to be static and does not change across restarts of the same silo.
member.param: A silo whose name we are interested in.
member.returns: TTrue if could return the requested name, false otherwise.
